nodes.text: The G-1A starfighter, also known as the G-1A transport, was a model of starfighter. One such vessel was the Mist Hunter owned by the bounty hunter Zuckuss. The starship was small enough that it could be equipped with a cloaking device and, during the reign of the Galactic Empire, at least one G-1A starfighter was equipped with cloaking ability.
